item.title: Registration Complete
item.description:
Registration Complete

Thank you for joining us!

âœ“ Payment Successful

Thank you for registering for Untold Lamoni Stories (February 27-28, 2026).

What's Next?

  • Check Your Email: A confirmation with your registration details and receipt has been sent to the email address you provided.
  • Event Details: You'll receive additional information about the event schedule, parking, and meal options closer to the event date.
  • Questions? Contact us at info@lamonihistoricalassociation.org or call (816) 312-8536.

Event Information

Untold Lamoni Stories
February 27-28, 2026
Shaw Center, Graceland University
Lamoni, Iowa
